title: What are the techniques and principles of magnetic therapy, and how can they be used for weight loss, self-hypnosis, and other therapeutic purposes?
first_phrase: In the final part of this text, we are introduced to various techniques and methods that can be used for self-hypnosis, crisis management, weight loss, and emotional and physical healing. We are also introduced to magnetic passes and their usage for working on the endocrine, nervous and psychological systems, and different types of muscular preferences.
